summary: When twelve ragtag teammates set out to play what should be a meaningless summer intramural baseball game, it ends up becoming the most important game of their lives.
cast: Matt Barr|Jim Belushi|Casey Bond|Robert Curtis Brown|Michael Bunin|Matt Bush|Eddie Coleman|Michael Consiglio|Chace Crawford|Don DiPetta|Jim DeAngelo|Michael Fishman|Billy Gardell|Jay Hayden|Toby Hemingway|Tyler Hoechlin|Austin Kane|Joseph Mazzello|John Mazzello|Manny Montana|Ryan Pinkston|David Del Rio|Duke Davis Roberts|Jonathan Runyon|Mary Elizabeth Runyon|Chris Roark|Aaron Tveit|Philip Winchester|Wolfe Coleman|Lee Ellis|Justin Fiore|Zach Green|Michael Guillod|Bruster Phoenix Sampson|Renne Araujo|Kimberley Datnow|Jack Gamero|Sarah Grace Hart|Katarina Hughes|Philipp Maximilian|Brian Nicholas Perez|Shelly Ro|Amanda Samoyloff|Anna B. Shaffer|Erika Stillwater|Adrienne Rose White
title: Undrafted
